# QuickCup API

API Backend for QuickCup Coffee Shop

## Tecnologias

- Java 17
- Maven
- Spring Boot 3.3.5
- Spring Web
- Spring Data JPA
- PostgreSQL
- Flyway
- Thymeleaf
- Docker e Docker Compose 3 para desenvolvimento local com postgres
- IntelliJ IDEA
